name: Wallpaper Interactable 3D for Android
description:
This Android App uses unity to loaded actual 3d models along with particle effects and game interactions as a mobile background.

currently there are 6 models in there but the ability to load models with a URL is being worked on and your donation will help the development further,

All models are either free from or made by me using blender.

*if it looks like it stuck lock and the unlock your phone. occurs when you set the wallpaper and close pause the app so the launcher service need to restart the unity module.
